arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1732232100000_c6d7e8f9g", "workspaceId": "ws_1732232100000_h0i1j2k3l", "sessionDescription": "Writing troubleshooting guide", "sessionMemory": "Creating common issues and solutions document", "toolContext": "Create guide", "primaryGoal": "Document troubleshooting", "subgoal": "Write guide"}, "filePath": "Docs/Troubleshooting.md", "content": "# Troubleshooting Guide

## Common Issues

### Cannot Connect to Database
- Check connection string
- Verify database is running
- Check firewall settings

### Application Crashes on Startup
- Review logs
- Check dependencies
- Verify configuration"}
